feed.title: Shlink Manager Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Shlink Manager: Shlink Manager v1.1.0
entry.content:
• Added the ability to edit existing short URLs
  • Tag colors now stay the same even after a view gets refreshed
  • Some code refactoring

Full Changelog: https://github.com/rainloreley/shlink-manager/compare/v0.9.1...v1.1.0

entry.title: New release for Shlink Manager: Shlink Manager v1.1.1
entry.content:
• Fixed a critical bug that prevented the app from loading data from the Shlink server

Full Changelog: https://github.com/rainloreley/shlink-manager/compare/v1.1.0...v1.1.1

entry.title: New release for Shlink Manager: Shlink Manager v1.2.0
entry.content:
• Added option in Android share sheet to quickly create a short URL
  • fixed missing version info in settings
  • made URLs in URL detail view clickable
  • minor code changes

Full Changelog: https://github.com/rainloreley/shlink-manager/compare/v1.1.1...v1.2.0

entry.title: New release for Shlink Manager: Shlink Manager v1.3.1
entry.content:
• Added support for viewing redirect rules
  • You can now add more than one Shlink instance to the app (click on the server info within the settings view)
  • minor fixes

Full Changelog: https://github.com/rainloreley/shlink-manager/compare/v1.2.0...v1.3.1

entry.title: New release for Shlink Manager: Shlink Manager v1.4.0
entry.content:
• Create and assign tags
  • Consistent and better color scheme (especially for dark mode)
  • Added link to docs on how to create an API key
  • Minor fixes and refactoring

Full Changelog: https://github.com/rainloreley/shlink-manager/compare/v1.3.1...v1.4.0
